<<<<<<< HEAD Epilogue Epilogue xenopediaimages/placeholder Extraterrestrials NULL The radar screens are silent. The death of the High Praetor has reduced the aliens held in our labs to a catatonic state; even our captured Praetor is utterly unresponsive. It seems the war is finally over.
Humanity is rightly celebrating our victory – the sacrifices made by the brave men and women of our organisation will echo through the ages. Though nobody has done more than I to ensure the survival of the human race, I have little doubt your name will be written into history just below my own. This does not mean our mission is over: the world will not simply return to how it was before the invasion began. It is inevitable that our new technology will drastically alter the balance of world power; even one of our singularity cores produces sufficient energy to supply the entire planet for centuries.
The squabbling has already begun. Some are already lobbying for our organisation to be placed under Soviet or American oversight. This technology could be used for the benefit of all humanity, irrespective of race or creed. Our backers instead seek to turn my inventions to their own narrow ends. But who better to decide the shape of our new world than those who saved it? We have bargaining chips of our own: direct control of both the cores themselves and the most sophisticated military force on the planet. I could annihilate the entire planet in the blink of an eye if I so chose. Are they really in a position to dictate to us?
The Xenonauts were established to protect humanity, Commander. You did exceptional work to protect us from the extraterrestrial menace; you must now plot a path that protects us from ourselves. ======= Researches.AlienCombatPlasma Heavy Vortex Projector xenopediaimages/placeholder Alien Weapons WEP The Heavy Vortex Launcher is a weapon predominantly used by Harridans and Androns and it has been reported by our field agents, that these weapons are the main device of mass-abduction missions. The amount of vortex used in each shot enables the invaders too hit more than one target at a time.
I must admit that I am not as much interested in the battle specifications and applications of this weapon, Commander. What is much more interesting to us - scientists - is the amount of Vortex stored in a single projectile. I do believe that by studying this substance, we will one day be able to adopt it to our arsenal.
Researches.VortexTech Vortex Managment xenopediaimages/placeholder Alien Technology WEP Vortex. A material of unknown origin, as I have earlier called it. There is, in fact, no substance on earth which would even come close to the atomic structure of this mysterious material. I dare say that we are not even dealing with atoms anymore. As controversial as this may sound, I do believe it might be some kind of by-product of dark matter. At this point: having seen things s-f writers did not even imagine, developing and discovering new technologies every goddamn day, and basically saving humanity on a daily basis… well I’m not afraid anymore to state even the most bold and controversial theories.
As with alenium, there is of course no possibility to reproduce it (or not yet at least, maybe tomorrow?) . But, as with alenium our brave minds have yet again, in a way, succeeded. This is our nature, Commander. The nature of adapting and retaliating. When saber-tooth cats attacked our ancestors, we retaliated by carving saber-tooth knives. When thick-hided herds of animals trampled our berry bushes, we took their skins, and turned them into our food, their furs, into our armor. When lightning struck down our shelters, we harnessed its by-product: fire. And we set the world ablaze. We are going to set the world ablaze once again, Commander. And in due time, we will set THEIR world ablaze. Mark my words!
Vortex is the key of bringing my words into motion. I do not know whether the aliens have underestimated our ability of adapting their technologies or if they are simply ignorant. But I do know, that they are going to gravely regret it.
Commander, before you lies a vortex filled bullet. We cannot create vortex, but we do know how to mold it, we do know how to use it. We do know how to harm the invaders with it. With your permission I will begin work on adapting our arsenal to this new projectile. Your men might soon need it.
Researches.UpgradeHP Vortex Powered Heavy Pistol xenopediaimages/warhawk2 Xenonauts Weapons WEP Specifications: Hüftschuss 18 ZE - 32% Genauigkeit Normal 28 ZE - 54% Genauigkeit Gezielt 48 ZE - 111% Genauigkeit Feuerrate: Single shot Schaden: Vortex Powered Ammo Caliber .50 (46 Nominal damage, 30 Stun Schaden) Panzerungsschaden: Medium Range of effect: Medium
Tactical Briefing: - Improved version of Warhawk effective against almost all enemies, lethal against some. - Laser Sights mounted; providing high Genauigkeit and better range of effect compared to other pistols. - Difficult to use and has only the capacity of holding 6 bullets. - Hard to reload.
As promised, the scientists always deliver. This is a mark II Warhawk WR-H60A, with all the technology, both ours and alien we have managed to create a handgun sturdy enough to be compatible with the previously developed vortex ammunition. Understandably, words such as ‘sturdy’ come along with others like ‘recoil’ and ‘heaviness’ but they also expand our lexicon by adding ‘lethal’ and ‘penetrating’.
Basically, the Warhawk mk II delivers everything its predecessor did and more. It serves the same role. And it definitely needs an experienced xenonaut to handle. Preferably one that is already acknowledged with the previous model.
Laser sights will be installed on all models. After discussing this with your team we have decided to resign from creating a dual version of this firearm. Firstly, because these weapons are becoming still more difficult to handle. Secondly, your men do prefer the safety of a shield in their second hand (while some of the more violent did opt for grenades). Finally, and most importantly we should try to preserve our vortex reserves, therefore every shot should be a hit, every shot should count. Advanced laser sights should make that easier. I do hope you will put this weapon to good use, Commander.
Researches.AdvancePlasmaRifle Vortex Powered Rifle xenopediaimages/keeper Xenonauts Weapons WEP Peace Keeper TSR-V1 Specifications: Hüftschuss 24 ZE - 43% Genauigkeit Gezielt 66 ZE - 95% Genauigkeit (laser sights) Burst Fire: 32 ZE - 32% Genauigkeit Feuerrate: High Schaden: Plasma Vortex Powered Ammo (55 Nominal damage, 15 Stun Schaden) Panzerungsschaden: High Range of effect: All ranges
Tactical Briefing: - Top of the line in Plasma technology, comparable to Alien Heavy Plasma Rifles - High powered ammunition powered by vortex provides this weapon exceptional armor penetration. - Our Knowledge of advanced rifles let us calibrate burst fire up to 4 bullets per action. - Costly to produce and difficult to handle.
Igitur qui desiderat pacem, praeparet bellum. Publius Vegetius might have been right about it. Though, maybe he did mixed it up a bit? If you want peace prepare for war. But what if we have war? Do we prepare peace? Scientists certainly do. Peace Keeper TSR-V1; the codename does have a rather nice ring to it, doesn’t it? The name was actually proposed by one of your men. They do seem to visit us at the laboratory ever more often nowadays. It seems that they are finally starting to feel gratitude for all the work we are putting into this operation.
Peace Keeper is what I was referring those months ago when we developed that first Vortex powered bullet. The time when I gave that vengeful, uproarious speech. Well, a lot of time has passed and a lot of brave men have died, unaware of the promise I gave that day. I do hope you have it in you to revenge them for me, Commander.
The weapon offers unprecedented armor penetration. There will no longer be neither a Ceasan nor Harridan who will feel safe behind one of their armored suits. The impact damage should also be sufficient to penetrate a skull or two, whatever the skull’s species might be.
Commander, this is, as always, a weapon for veterans. But do we even have anything less than veterans anymore? I don’t even know anymore, I’ve been closed in my laboratory for the past months, I couldn’t bare to walk outside, not before finishing my work. I probably wouldn’t had noticed if there was another base attack during that period. And I haven’t met any of your men outside of my lab for a long time. I do hope your lads are doing fine. I do hope we will be able to finish this work sir, my work, your work. This must come to an end someday. Let us prepare for that peace that will one day come.
airplane.human.su Su-T10 Cheburashka xenopediaimages/su Xenonaut Aircraft AC We will not be able to repel an enemy invasion by using one type of aircraft alone. Whilst Condors are ideal for shooting down light crafts, we still need a heavy fighter that will provide us with more options in case the invaders manage to bring some of their bigger crafts into our airspace.
The Soviets were on a good way to creating a heavy interceptor which would be able to combat any NATO aircrafts: F15s among others. Ironically, the Soviet prototype: T10. Will now be equipped with many of F15s systems. All for a greater good. The T10 suffered from various defects, I’m sure the Russians would be able to pan those out themselves in a couple of years. But we no longer have those years (neither will we be fighting NATO’s air force). Instead we rushed the development project and a T-10 – F15 hybrid emerged. The Russians dubbed it Su-27; code: Red Eagle. But we will use our own terminology to avoid confusion with local military forces. And of course: our crafts will be enhanced with the latest anti-alien technology - to improve performance.
Our Su-T10 will serve as a heavy fighter and will therefore be used to combat more sturdy alien crafts. Su-T10 can mount many more rockets than our Concords, and the damage output will naturally be much higher. The airframe was covered with twice as much titanium which should provide increased durability. Unfortunately, this did force us to reduce the weight of the electronic locking-system. Aiming and picking out targets will be left to the pilot.
The codename: “Cheburashka” comes from one of our pilot’s first experiences with the T-10 prototype. The aircraft allows for extreme maneuvers both at low and high speed. Naturally, this will cause nausea to some of our less trained pilots. The mentioned pilot was shaky on his feet hours after the flight. It reminded the Soviet instructors of a Russian cartoon featuring a shaky, toppling creature – the Cheburashka.
What might, cause nausea to you, Commander, is the price we will have to pay for each aircraft. The drawback of using rushed prototypes is of course the lack of mass-produced parts. Also, as might have been expected the amount of titanium on the market has radically diminished over the past months and therefore the upkeep cost of our Su-T10 will be high as well.
Tactical briefing:
- Heavy fighter suited for fighting small and medium crafts. - Concords are still a better choice against light scouts and fighters. - Very good maneuverability. - Very high potential damage output (at the cost of limited initial damage). - High cost and upkeep.
human.tech.cobra Cobra Maneuver xenopediaimages/cobra Strategy NULL It seems that one of our pilots has devised a new maneuver which might be useful when flying our new Su-T10 Cheburashka. Your secretary has already drawn up a first draft of the maneuver.

human.tech.firstaid Recovering Stunned Soldiers xenopediaimages/firstaid Strategy NULL We have conducted preliminary experiments on the substance used in this new alien weapon. Battle reports indicate that, with luck, the weapon only subdues the victim, rather than outright killing him. We do not yet know how this is done, however it was discovered (as in most cases: accidentally) that morphine instead of easing any pain the patient might suffer, actually removes the subduing factor.
What this means, Commander. Is that you will be able to put your stunned soldier back on their feet, even during battle. All you need is a medic kit and a soldier who’s bright enough to operate a syringe.
Though, I wouldn't advise sending morphine dosed soldier to the front line. In the best case scenario they will be knocked-out back to sleep. In the worst... I expect you already know your soldiers limitations better than I do.

Researches.Max_CaineAutopsy Max_Caine xenopediaimages/imperials Special Encounters NULL The Imperial Guard, also known as the Astra Militarum in traditional High Gothic, is the largest coherent fighting force in the galaxy. They serve as the Imperium of Man's primary combat force and first line of defence from the myriad threats which threaten the existence of the human race in the late 41st Millennium. It is comprised of countless billions of men and women -- hundreds of thousands of different regiments, supported by a vast array of light and heavy armoured vehicles that provide the Guard's primary offensive punch. They are usually the first Imperial force to respond to a threat if a planet's Planetary Defence Force (PDF) fails to suppress it. Humans are not a exclusive specie on earth, looks like there are other human civilitations in outer space.
The person that we found in the last encounter seems to be a guerrilla leader called "Max Caine", looks like he was victim of Mental control and has been captured and slaved by preators. The subject looks to have great skills in "piloting aircrafts", "Forum Moderation", "Laser Rifles" and "Alien grenades". In delirium he refer as some kind of phrase "Add the Condition Black..." but we dont have any clue about the meaning.
The most enigmatic of the case is that the subject "Max" was not alone, other human of his militia accompanied him in his captivity. Identified as "Henry_Ponciano" seems to have a unique Psionic skill, He able to "Draw pictures in the minds of men", their talent is a rare gift and difficult to replicate, posibemente this gift is the last we see in this crusade.
It will be possible to find more subjects trapped as these human commander?
Researches.SolverAutopsy Solver xenopediaimages/coder Special Encounters NULL According to the best available intelligence, the person known as "Solver" is a Soviet-born scientist. The last clear records of him indicate that he was a student at the Riga Polytechnical Institute. After that, Solver seemingly disappeared to one of the Soviet closed towns, allegedly working on top-secret computer-guided propulsion systems that are controlled by an AI.
The UK, US, Canada, Israel and West Germany have claimed - privately of course - that Solver might have attended scientific conferences in these countries under fake identities, but no conclusive proof has ever been produced. If these claims are true, that would indicate that he was one of the most prized Soviet scientists for only a few were able to travel to Western countries in the course of their work.
Curiously, a few months ago a transmission from Zvyozdny Gorodok to the Kremlin was intercepted, saying something about "suspicions that the currently missing person whom you are well familiar with may be involved in non-terrestrial research". It now appears reasonable to suggest that this Solver individual has somehow left the Soviet Union aboard an alien ship and has since that time been assisting the extraterrestrials
Researches.KabillAutopsy Kabill xenopediaimages/placeholder Special Encounters NULL Documents archived at the Deutsch-Russische Museum in Karlshorst imply that the mercenary Wilhelm Schneider - now more commonly known as "Kabill" - began his career as a Wehrmacht sniper operating on the Easten Front during the Second World War. According to this documentation, Kabill is credited with over nine hundred kills during the war and his unparalleled marksmanship earned him the nickname "der Kaiser" from his fellow squad-mates.
Sources at the Kremlin claim that Kabill was recruited as a Soviet agent after his capture by Russian forces during the Battle of Romania. Employing him as a spy and assassin, Kabill is said to have become one of the USSR's most reliable and successful agents. However, when the KGB was formed in 1954, he is said to have made some politically inept moves which resulted in him falling out of favour with senior officials. Removed from active duty, Kabill was thus relocated to northern Siberia where he remained except for occasions which called for his exceptional skill.
Kabill has been unofficially associated with several high-profile shootings carried out since 1960. According to the CIA, Kabill is one of their most wanted Soviet agents and Kremlin sources claim that he was almost killed during a CIA raid on his home in 1971. In 1975, a move was made to recruit Kabill into the Xenonauts project, but the Kremlin refused to even acknowledge his existence. The outbreak of the Alien War has not changed changed this, although it is not apparent that he has been recruited to serve with Soviet defense forces either.

Researches.Gargol Gargol Autopsy xenopediaimages/gargol Alien Units NULL THE ABDUCTED - Grügols Description: When sebillian take prisoners never happen in vain, they subject the person to aggressive and painful procedures to make them perfect slaves. They call this endless servants as "Grügols", due to the difficulty of pronunciation of our soldiers nick them under the codename "Gargol". Living humans in earth are victims from this procedure commander, each time you kill one of this beast remember that they are humans partially dead that have part of his mind alive.
Speed: Medium Resilience: HIGH Characteristics: Regeneration, High Muscular build, Unblockable, Immune to chemicals Damage potential: Physical Kinetic - Moderated Behavior: Melee metshield - Support ranged units.
Researches.Viper Viper Autopsy xenopediaimages/viper Alien Units NULL THE BREED - Vipers
Description: Caesans had a little dark secret, they found the key of eternal life, they master some kind of technique about how to produce it. This wonderful mystery of the universe let the caesans build his eternal towers and cities in his home planet, they force the life to cheat on his tide. Now they reach Earth, thanks to "The Protean Alliance" and they are not alone. They create creatures called "Vipers", heavy hunter capable to hunt better than a lion and heavy armored. Commander... I suggest to use tanks and heavy weapons here, never let them reach your soldiers.
Speed: High Resilience: Moderated to High (Depend on the size of the unit) Characteristics: Regeneration, Agile body build, Heavy Armored Against kinetic Damage potential: Physical Kinetic - Moderated Behavior: Ambusher - Pack attack.
Researches.CorvetteHull Corvetter Recovered Equipment xenopediaimages/recover UFOs UFO We successfully recovered all the devices and materials from our captured Corvette. We had a difficult time when it comes to deciphering the complex codes and artifacts recovered from the ship. But with it we have taken a huge step in the domain of sky, well ... do not misunderstand me commander we have only just begun.
We found that the Corvettes and the ships of larger size have a, technically speaking, weak spot that they are unable to protect by evasive maneuvers... Actually they must also be aware of it as, the spot is made to withstand heavy fire. Heavy plasma fire – yet aliens seem to still not to be prepared for extensive explosives damage. If we tried to destroy a Capital Ship with nothing but cannons and regular missiles, our pilots would need a dangerous amount of minutes to execute their mission. This calls for a change of tactic.
My plan is crude Commander, maybe not that what you would expect after all the man force it took, but it should be effective. I designed an experimental version of a high penetration missile. Now we will need a new aircraft to carry those. Potentially, it could be installed on our Su-T10 but those things still suffer from severe technical issues as it goes for the in-flight computer aiming system. Equipping them with our new heavy missiles would be turning them into kamikaze machines. Instead I’ve taken the liberty of signing a new contract with the Soviets. The will provide us with Mig31 machines and we will adjust them to our needs…
Be warned, Commander. Those are not the most acrobatic aircrafts you have ever seen, but at least they have engines powerful enough to carry heavy rockets and some extra layers of titanium armor.
Researches.LandingHull Landing Recovered Equipment xenopediaimages/recover UFOs UFO The exterior differences between a Landing Ship and a Corvette are minor – only a few electrical devices. There is a difference in quantity though: lots of powerful generators, thrusters and undoubtedly more layers of armor. If we would incorporate this Alien Alloy platting on our aircrafts we make another breakthrough step on the path of air superiority.
I do have some ideas in mind, I believe we can significantly improve armor and the flight speed of our fighters. Permission to allocate extra funds into the project, Commander?.
And could you please tell your baboons from manufacturing to not eat whilst disassembling precious alien technology? They have covered a peculiar artifact with a layer of peanut butter…it’s all sticky now and it isn’t working. For all we know it might have been a key to understanding the alien invasion, or the answer to the meaning of life itself. Now all it does is it smells like peanuts and jelly.
Researches.CrusierHull Crusier Recovered Equipment xenopediaimages/recover UFOs UFO If only we could replicate the structure and fire potential of Cruisers, we would have no problems with the invasion at all, but that is just wishful thinking. On a more practical note: we have found some interesting combat devices from the invaders. The shape, hull structure and electronics of this aircraft will enable us to start a new era of aircraft development.
Right now we have some early prototypes of future aircrafts, but we need more salvaged pieces from Extraterrestrial Crafts - the bigger, the better. For now I would also want to introduce a special kind of interceptor. Though, I would like to wait with the report details until it’s fully operational.
Researches.CarrierHull Carrier Recovered Equipment xenopediaimages/recover UFOs UFO This can be considered a Mothership, the most dangerous extraterrestrial leaders are protected by the powerful weaponry and armor layers of this ship. If you’re looking for information I suggest you to look into this ship. The Carriers allow our research team to develop better air combat strategies, its advanced sensors, weaponry, power sources and armor give us an incredible amount of information. With all this information we expect a huge advancement in air and ground war tactics. We found that this Alien Capital Ship is capable of very rapid fire with its plasma cannons, making the fire barrage almost impossible to evade. Only Alenium-Reactor-Powered-Aircraft can deal with this kind of weapon system that is otherwise deadly to conventional internal combustion engine aircrafts.
Thanks to the deep analysis and amount of information recovered we now a new project on our agenda: a prototype of Alenium Reactor Powered Aircraft, superior to any technology in earth.
Researches.AlienCorvetteDatacoreDsb Corvetter Dissembling Protocol xenopediaimages/protocol UFOs UFO The Corvette is a small alien capital ship, its complex devices make this vehicle a dangerous adversary. Various safety devices have caused the loss of a large amounts of information. Clearly, these ships are designed for military operations and military secrecy that would prevent reverse engineering, we however, are humans – born scavengers. Commander, I have prepared plans to extract the most valuable parts out of this invasion craft. We may be able to learn the weaknesses and methods of manufacture used by our opponent.
Important Commander I'll always ask formally that the first ship of a new type to be disassembled and parts shipped directly to our laboratories for analysis. As for the rest, well if we do not find anything we want to use, we can always sell it. Governments need all the useless alien artifacts they can get, if not for scientific reasons, then at least for propaganda reasons. After all, they need to present some fruits of our labor to the general public.
Researches.AlienLandingCraftDatacoreDsb Landing Ship Dissembling Protocol xenopediaimages/protocol UFOs UFO A Landing Ship is a prime means of transporting extraterrestrial troops into battle. These are still rather “civilian” crafts armed with some self-defenses rather than true military ships. Of course the weaponry system is formidable but I do believe we will have to expect much worse opponents in the near future. It would be best to analyze these ships before bigger ones come around. As it might be too late at that point.
Commander, I have prepared plans to extract the most valuable parts out of this invasion craft. We may be able to learn the weaknesses and methods of manufacture used by our opponent.
Important: Commander I'll always ask formally that the first ship of a new type to be disassembled and parts shipped directly to our laboratories for analysis. As for the rest, well if we do not find anything we want to use, we can always sell it. Governments need all the useless alien artifacts they can get, if not for scientific reasons, then at least for propaganda reasons. After all, they need to present some fruits of our labor to the general public.
Researches.AlienCruiserDatacoreDsb Crusier Dissembling Protocol xenopediaimages/protocol UFOs UFO The Cruiser is a heavy combat aircraft, it represents the aerial supremacy of our opponents. We have reasons to believe that the Cruisers are the smallest version of alien true military ships, still this invasion ship are far superior compared to our own designs. We found a peculiarity about this ship they have some kind of cloaking shield that makes this aircraft tough and very difficult to detect by our radars. Maybe we can recreate these capabilities in our new aircrafts.
Commander, I have prepared plans to extract the most valuable parts out of this invasion craft. We may be able to learn the weaknesses and methods of manufacture used by our opponent.

As for the rest, well if we do not find anything we want to use, we can always sell it. Researches.AlienCarrierDatacoreDsb Carrier Dissembling Protocol xenopediaimages/protocol UFOs UFO Carriers are ship of huge size that represent a real and very visible threat to humanity. These ships seem to have storage units specially made to support advanced warriors, carry supplies, alien eggs and cages to bring beasts from across the whole galaxy. Maybe we could collect part of the structure, we noticed that the power generators are tremendously powerful. We might make a very big step in manufacturing of strong, fast and powerful interceptors that could use generators as this.
Commander, I have prepared plans to extract the most valuable parts out of this invasion craft. We may be able to learn the weaknesses and methods of manufacture used by our opponent.
Important: Commander I'll always ask formally that the first ship of a new type to be disassembled and parts shipped directly to our laboratories for analysis. As for the rest, well if we do not find anything we want to use, we can always sell it. Governments need all the useless alien artifacts they can get, if not for scientific reasons, then at least for propaganda reasons. Researches.AlienBattleshipDatacoreDsb Battleship Dissembling Protocol xenopediaimages/protocol UFOs UFO Commander, things will not be easy, the appearance of this alien ship puts us in constant risk. Each Warship of this class that appears in the skies can mean the lives of millions dying in its shade. The complexity of the security systems seems impenetrable and it’s difficult to say if it will advance our technology any time soon. If anything it would require years of research. We do not have that time. It is preferable to sell all the recovered equipment and desperately try to prepare and increase our aircraft fleet, we'll need more than three aircrafts to shot this beast down.
I wish you the best of luck commander, our fate is in your hands.
